thread.title: Revionics to Present at Goldman Sachs’ 22nd Annual Global Retailing Conference
thread.title_full: Revionics to Present at Goldman Sachs’ 22nd Annual Global Retailing Conference

title: Revionics to Present at Goldman Sachs’ 22nd Annual Global Retailing Conference
text:
Revionics to Present at Goldman Sachs’ 22 nd Annual Global Retailing Conference “eCommerce Enablers” panel will discuss cutting-edge technologies that enable retailers to create a sustainable competitive advantage in today’s dynamic marketplace September 02, 2015 06:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
AUSTIN, Texas-  Revionics, Inc. , a global provider of End-to-End Merchandise Optimization solutions , today announced that Cheryl Sullivan , Revionics’ Senior Vice President of Product Strategy, will be a speaker on the “eCommerce Enablers” panel at Goldman Sachs’ 22 nd Annual Global Retailing Conference on Thursday, September 10, 2015 at 11:20 a.m. EDT in the Grand Ballroom at The Plaza Hotel in New York, along with other panelists from Demandware and Quiet Logistics . The Goldman Sachs conference consists of two full days of fireside chats and presentations designed to connect companies with the institutional investment community for valuable opportunities and discussions. 
The “eCommerce Enablers” panelists will share their perspectives on what cutting-edge technology is available today for retailers, including omni-channel and etailers, to help them more effectively and precisely execute their business strategy with predictable and profitable outcomes. The panel, which is the first to include leading technology providers featured at a Goldman Sachs Global Retailing Conference, will also dive into best practices that impact technology adoption and accelerate return on investment (ROI). 
Revionics executives including Sullivan and Revionics Chief Financial Officer Brian Hansen will be available for private consultations with attendees during this event. To meet with Revionics at the event, please contact info@revionics.com . 
Tweet this: Great agenda at #GSRetailConf15 including eCommerce Enablers panel w/ @Revionics, @Demandware & @QuietBot: https://goo.gl/X1xIcH #Retail 
About Revionics, Inc. 
Revionics is a proven leader in End-to-End Merchandise Optimization solutions. Over 40,000+ retail locations around the world optimize with Revionics across 18M+ products and 2.2B+ SKU/store combinations are modeled weekly. Revionics empowers retailers around the globe to profitably execute a data-driven omnichannel merchandising strategy by utilizing one of the most comprehensive set of shopper demand signals to increase financial performance and improve customer satisfaction. Revionics’ solutions are powered by unmatched demand-based science and advanced predictive analytics to help ensure retailers have the right product, price, promotion, placement and space allocation to drive business performance and seamless shopper experience – online, in-store, social and mobile. Delivered on a scalable, SaaS-based platform, Revionics solutions offer real-time insights and dynamic decisions at speed, scale and frequency, while providing fast ROI. Revionics has been recognized as a Deloitte Technology Fast 500™ and JMP Securities’ Hot 100 Software Company. To learn how you can compete more profitably, please visit www.revionics.com . Contacts 
Alison Raffalovich, +1 512-826-0538 (USA)Senior Director, Corporate Communications Release Summary 
Revionics SVP of Product Strategy Cheryl Sullivan joins "eCommerce Enablers" panel at Goldman Sachs Global Retailing Conference. Sharing
